eu_initiatives:
Country specific recommendations of the EU-Commission according to the services directive to Germany. 
Infringement case against Germany refering to the establishment of large scale retail.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
ZIA, German real estate stakeholders 
http://www.zia-deutschland.de/
goals__remit:
Sports retail, development and production. 
Our main purpose is to make sports accessible for the many.
relevant_communication: We filed a complaint against regional German laws concerning the estalbishment of large scale retail. This initiative is based upon the services directive. In our point of view, these German regulations violate the EU-treaty concerning freedom of establishment and hamper the free market.
